message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be very valuable to you. I'm asking for $15,000 for it. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price.  While I value your interest, I can't go as low as $10,000. Could you meet me halfway at $12,500?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
